name: F. Magic Matrix
statement:
You’re given a matrix of size .Let’s call the matrix with nonnegative
elements magic if it is symmetric (so ), and for all triples . Note that
do not need to be distinct.Determine if the matrix is magic.As the
input/output can reach very huge size it is recommended to use fast
input/output methods: for example, prefer to use instead of in C++,
prefer to use instead of in .
